changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.comment: save ids of campaign folders to delete
changeSet.sql: insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER', folder.CLN_ID from CAMPAIGN_FOLDER folder where folder.CLN_ID not in ( select DESCENDANT_ID from CLN_RELATIONSHIP ) and folder.CLN_ID not in ( select CONTENT_ID from CAMPAIGN_LIBRARY_CONTENT ) ;
changeSet.comment: store info if exist campaign folders to delete
changeSet.sql: insert into IS_TO_DELETE (NAME, TOTAL) select 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER', count(1) from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE where NAME = 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER' ;

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.sql:
insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER', cf.CLN_ID from CAMPAIGN_FOLDER cf, CLN_RELATIONSHIP_CLOSURE crc, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where cf.CLN_ID = crc.DESCENDANT_ID and crc.ANCESTOR_ID = etd.ID and etd.NAME = 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER' ;
insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'CAMPAIGN', c.CLN_ID from CAMPAIGN c, CLN_RELATIONSHIP_CLOSURE crc, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where c.CLN_ID = crc.DESCENDANT_ID and crc.ANCESTOR_ID = etd.ID and etd.NAME = 'CAMPAIGN_FOLDER' ;

insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'ATTACHMENT_LIST', cln.ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID from CAMPAIGN_LIBRARY_NODE cln, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where cln.CLN_ID = etd.ID and etd.NAME in ('CAMPAIGN_FOLDER', 'CAMPAIGN') ;
changeSet.comment: save if campaign to delete exists
changeSet.sql: insert into IS_TO_DELETE (NAME, TOTAL) select 'CAMPAIGN', count(1) from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'CAMPAIGN' ;

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.sql: insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE', cfv.CFV_ID from CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE cfv, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where cfv.BOUND_ENTITY_TYPE = 'CAMPAIGN' and cfv.BOUND_ENTITY_ID = etd.ID and etd.NAME = 'CAMPAIGN' ;
insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'ITERATION', ci.ITERATION_ID from CAMPAIGN_ITERATION ci, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'CAMPAIGN' and ci.CAMPAIGN_ID = etd.ID ;
insert into IS_TO_DELETE (NAME, TOTAL) select 'ITERATION', count(1) from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITERATION' ;

changeSet.author: mpagnon
changeSet.sql: insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'ATTACHMENT_LIST', it.ATTACHMENT_LIST_ID from ITERATION it, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITERATION' and etd.ID = it.ITERATION_ID ;

insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE', cfv.CFV_ID from CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE cfv, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITERATION' and etd.ID = cfv.BOUND_ENTITY_ID and cfv.BOUND_ENTITY_TYPE = 'ITERATION' ;
insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'ITPI', itpl.ITEM_TEST_PLAN_ID from ITEM_TEST_PLAN_LIST itpl, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITERATION' and etd.ID = itpl.ITERATION_ID ;
insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'TEST_SUITE', its.TEST_SUITE_ID from ITERATION_TEST_SUITE its, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITERATION' and etd.ID = its.ITERATION_ID ;
insert into IS_TO_DELETE (NAME, TOTAL) select 'TEST_SUITE', count(1) from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'TEST_SUITE' ;
changeSet.comment: save if itpi to delete property
changeSet.sql: insert into IS_TO_DELETE (NAME, TOTAL) select 'ITPI', count(1) from ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'ITPI' ;

insert into ENTITIES_TO_DELETE (NAME, ID) select 'AUTOMATED_EXECUTION_EXTENDER', aee.EXTENDER_ID from AUTOMATED_EXECUTION_EXTENDER aee, ENTITIES_TO_DELETE etd where etd.NAME = 'EXECUTION' and etd.ID = aee.MASTER_EXECUTION_ID ;
